reviewText: this movie was one of the best i have seen.it helps you realize that even gods son was no acception the the cruelty and pain caused in this world.i think that the actors really poured their hearts out in this film,making it  a huge success.i was devoted to this film because they showed the love and  passion of jesus they,make it look real,you know production.it was sad that  even what he proved to the people who he was what he did they still didn't  believe him.but then in the end they regreted it.a heart breaker if you are  pulled in and i am sure that you will be influenced to by this film.
